body.name: hecef Ceramic Knife Set 3-Piece, include 6'' Chef's Knife, 4'' Utility Knife and 3'' Paring Knife, Black Ceramic Knives for kitchen - Sharp Knife Never Rust Blade
body.stockDetail: Only 15 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: [Simple and Health] 3-piece ceramic knives set include a 6'' Chef knife, a 4'' Utility knife, and a 3'' fruit peeling knife, which is resistant to rust and corrosion forever. Keeping food fresh and nutritious, this knife set retains its original taste, which makes your cooking experience more enjoyable!

[Black and Mirror Blades] The ultimate elegant pure black color with no impurities and a specially manufactured technology-mirror finish, make the whole knife set look elegant and clean. So our knife is not easy to stick food over the blade yet is aesthetic enough to impress your guests.

[Premium Touch & Anti-slip Handle] The black handle is made of ABS+TPR, with an ergonomic design, so this handle is extremely comfortable to touch and non-slip! Let you easily fall in love with the feeling of using ceramic knives.

[Sharp and Lightweight Blades] Our ceramic knives have extremely sharp blades Suitable for any vegetable, fruit, or soft meat, which won't require sharpening for years! The whole knife is light and comfortable, making cutting effortless!

[High-Quality Gift] When you have personally used this ceramic knife, you may be tempted to give the same gift to your family and friends! On quality issues, we guarantee 100% SATISFACTION OR FULL REFUND! But you should be noted that ceramic knives cannot be used to cut hard objects such as bones, ice cubes, and corn.
body.description: HIGH-TECH ZIRCONIUM JEWEL KNIFE-make cooking a breeze A black (HIP) blade is made out of black zirconium oxide and offers extra durability. This type of blade goes through an extra firing process called a "hot-isostatic press," creating a tighter weave between the ceramic molecules, thus creating a tougher blade. NEVER RUST, NON-SCRATCH, HOLD ODOR, LIGHTWEIGHT, and DISCOLOR Using a rusted knife has a very negative effect on your nutrition Infectious germs can actually get into the food. This Ceramic knife will not oxidize or wear away as do metal knives. It tolerates acids better than any metal. Moreover, it's lightweight and it doesn’t rust, stain, hold odor or discolor. Ceramic performs quite better than stainless steel, especially after a long time use. Though ceramic is easy to be broken if not treated well, it will never be dull without being sharpened, while the steel knife will and sometime may get rust.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: NEVER RUST NON-SCRATCH LONG TIME SHARP HOLD ODOR LIGHTWEIGHT DISCOLOR EASY TO CLEAN HIGH-TECH ZIRCONIUM JEWEL KNIFE-make cooking a breeze A black (HIP) blade is made out of black zirconium oxide and offers extra durability. This type of blade goes through an extra firing process called a "hot-isostatic press," creating a tighter weave between the ceramic molecules, thus creating a tougher blade. NEVER RUST, NON-SCRATCH, HOLD ODOR, LIGHTWEIGHT, and DISCOLOR Using a rusted knife has a very negative effect on your nutrition Infectious germs can actually get into the food. This Ceramic knife will not oxidize or wear away as do metal knives. It tolerates acids better than any metal. Moreover, it's lightweight and it doesn’t rust, stain, hold odor or discolor. Ceramic performs quite better than stainless steel, especially after a long time use. Though ceramic is easy to be broken if not treated well, it will never be dull without being sharpened, while the steel knife will and sometime may get rust.

FRIENDLY TIPS: Do not use to cut frozen goods, bones or fish bones or something like that.The blade is super sharp with a bigger edge, so don't use your hand to test the hardness of the blade and no need to be sharpened. These knives should be used on wooden, plastic or bamboo cutting boards only. Using these knives on glass, marble, or tile can cause the blades to chip or break. Do not drop them on the ground.Do not try to put the knife into the dishwasher. After using, please just rinse or wash them by hand with a mild detergent and wipe them with kitchen towel.
6'' Chef's Knife 4'' Utility Knife 3'' Paring Knife

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These are outstanding. Razor sharp, and comfortable.
reviews.reviewText: I'm impressed. The blades on these are razor sharp. The handle is the ceramic part. The blades appear to be stainless steel that is made black through some kind of reactive process. They are comfortable to hold, and they don't feel cheap at all. The $18 price is quite reasonable. I definitely recommend these. Enjoy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice knife set
reviews.reviewText: I couldn't believe that these knifes are actually made out of ceramic since they do look like regular knifes. They are well made and very sharp. I was very impressed with these. They came well packaged with the tips protected. I do like that these won't rust which is great. Very nice set that really cuts.
